slogan.quote: Fifty years of wonder, admiration, and joy

home.title: Hello
home.text:
My name is Maria. Welcome to my laboratory!
I’m a backend developer who started out with PHP and Drupal (this system was my passion for many years), later explored Symfony. Now I’m diving into Java, while also developing in Android and game development.
As a hobby — and more than just a hobby — I create plugins for Minecraft servers.
Every step of my journey has been an exciting experience, and I’m glad You’re here.

about.title: About me
about.text: The “About Me” section is still under construction. Soon, there will be a story about what I do and what inspires me.

projects.title: Projects
projects.text: Here are some of my web projects

minecraft.title: Minecraft
minecraft.text:
In this special section, experiments with Minecraft plugins (Spigot, Paper) are carried out.
By the way, I take orders :)
